replies.author: EmptyLava
replies.txt_content: https://api.extendedclip.com/all/ 在此寻找变量下载后放入papi插件的变量文件夹

replies.author: 冷枫小乐
replies.txt_content:
输入/papi ecloud download Player等下载完
再输入/papi reload
试试看

replies.author: DE_SHARK
replies.txt_content:
冷枫小乐 发表于 2020-2-23 17:43
输入/papi ecloud download Player等下载完
再输入/papi reload
试试看
已自行解决了，蟹蟹，原来的papi插件无法载入变量
